001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidTypeFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAtomicValuedItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.stream.Stream;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * Implements
029 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-data">fn:data</a>.
030 */
031public final class FnData {
032  private static final String NAME = "data";
033  @NonNull
034  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_NO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
035      .name(NAME)
036      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
037      .deterministic()
038      .contextDependent()
039      .focusDependent()
040      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
041      .returnOne()
042      .functionHandler(FnData::executeNoArg)
043      .build();
044
045  @NonNull
046  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
047      .name(NAME)
048      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
049      .deterministic()
050      .contextIndependent()
051      .focusIndependent()
052      .argument(IArgument.builder()
053          .name("arg1")
054          .type(IItem.class)
055          .zeroOrMore()
056          .build())
057      .returnType(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
058      .returnOne()
059      .functionHandler(FnData::executeOneArg)
060      .build();
061
062  private FnData() {
063    // disable construction
064  }
065
066  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
067  @NonNull
068  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeNoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
069      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
070      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
071      IItem focus) {
072
073    INodeItem item = FunctionUtils.requireTypeOrNull(INodeItem.class, focus);
074
075    ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> retval;
076    if (item == null) {
077      retval = ISequence.empty();
078    } else {
079      IAnyAtomicItem data = fnDataItem(item);
080      retval = ISequence.of(data);
081    }
082    return retval;
083  }
084
085  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
086  @NonNull
087  private static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> executeOneArg(
088      @NonNull IFunction function,
089      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
090      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
091      IItem focus) {
092
093    ISequence<?> sequence = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
094    return fnData(sequence);
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
099   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-data">fn:data</a>
100   * supporting <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-atomization">item
101   * atomization</a>.
102   *
103   * @param sequence
104   *          the sequence of items to atomize
105   * @return the atomized result
106   */
107  @SuppressWarnings("null")
108  @NonNull
109  public static ISequence<IAnyAtomicItem> fnData(@NonNull ISequence<? extends IItem> sequence) {
110    return ISequence.of(sequence.stream()
111        .flatMap(FnData::atomize));
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * An implementation of
116   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-atomization">item
117   * atomization</a>.
118   *
119   * @param item
120   *          the item to atomize
121   * @return the atomized result
122   */
123  @NonNull
124  public static IAnyAtomicItem fnDataItem(@NonNull IItem item) {
125    IAnyAtomicItem retval = null;
126    if (item instanceof IAtomicValuedItem) {
127      retval = ((IAtomicValuedItem) item).toAtomicItem();
128    }
129
130    if (retval != null) {
131      return retval;
132    }
133    throw new InvalidTypeFunctionException(InvalidTypeFunctionException.NODE_HAS_NO_TYPED_VALUE, item);
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * An implementation of
138   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-atomization">item
139   * atomization</a>.
140   *
141   * @param item
142   *          the item to atomize
143   * @return the atomized result
144   */
145  @NonNull
146  public static Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> fnDataItem(@NonNull IArrayItem<?> item) {
147    return ObjectUtils.notNull(item.stream().flatMap(member -> {
148      Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> result;
149      if (member instanceof IItem) {
150        result = atomize((IItem) member);
151      } else if (member instanceof ISequence) {
152        result = ((ISequence<?>) member).stream()
153            .flatMap(FnData::atomize);
154      } else {
155        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("array member not an item or sequence.");
156      }
157      return result;
158    }));
159  }
160
161  /**
162   * An implementation of
163   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-atomization">item
164   * atomization</a>.
165   *
166   * @param item
167   *          the item to atomize
168   * @return the atomized result
169   */
170  @NonNull
171  public static Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> atomize(@NonNull IItem item) {
172    Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> retval;
173    if (item instanceof IAnyAtomicItem) {
174      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.of((IAnyAtomicItem) item));
175    } else if (item instanceof IAtomicValuedItem) {
176      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.of(((IAtomicValuedItem) item).toAtomicItem()));
177    } else if (item instanceof IArrayItem) {
178      retval = fnDataItem((IArrayItem<?>) item);
179    } else {
180      throw new InvalidTypeFunctionException(InvalidTypeFunctionException.NODE_HAS_NO_TYPED_VALUE, item);
181    }
182    return retval;
183  }
184}
